metadata.title: CVE-2018-6519 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The SAML2 library before 1.10.4, 2.x before 2.3.5, and 3.x before 3.1.1 inSimpleSAMLphp has a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability forfraction-of-seconds data in a timestamp.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
